name: Fix 404 Not Found error for gemini-pro model
objective: Resolve the '404 models/gemini-pro is not found' error by updating the model name to a valid, versioned identifier in the ChatGoogleGenerativeAI initialization.

tasks.prompt: Update the `ChatGoogleGenerativeAI` initialization in `src/agent/router.py` to use the model name `gemini-1.0-pro` instead of `gemini-pro`.

git.commit_message: [Step 1] Update Gemini model name to gemini-1.0-pro.

tasks.prompt: Verify the fix by running the application and sending a query.
